item.title: Alexa Skills with Golang
item.description: Few weeks ago, I wrote a post about my personal project for a Security Home Alarm System based on Golang, Raspberry PI and 433Mhz sensors ( see again here ). After that, I thought that the next step for that project could be an Alexa Skill integration, in order to control and manage the Alarm System just with my voice. This week, I bought a new Amazon Echo Dot, and today, the new functionality is ready to share with all of you ;)
